pullRequest.title: 1486: Fixing Unit and Personnel Export to CSV and Localizing Top Menu Bar
pullRequest.bodyText: This fixes #1486, and includes a major refactor in CampaignGUI that expands the localization and orders it in the same order as the top menu bar in the campaign.

commit.message: 1486: Adding javadoc comment and fixing spelling issues in exportTableToCSV
1486: Fixing Date Format issues, adding TODO for inline date formats, and some minor fixes in Finances.java
1486: Added space to keep header within 100 chars
1486: Fixing Export to Finances, Units, and Personnel
1486: Reordering and adding resources for CampaignGUI
